name: BulletLess West
description:
Controls: move with wasd, space to jump and l to aim

Aim your enemies to scare them away before they take your money, cowboy

Code by Ruben Moreno Romero and Oriol Perarnau Arnau Art by Oriol Font Climent, Carla Maya Rey and Laura Sanchez-pascuala gomez Sound design by Ruben Moreno Romero Music by Oriol Perarnau Arnau
